thread.title: BRIEF-Unisplendour signs MOU with 21Vianet and Microsoft (China) on cloud computing in China
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Unisplendour signs MOU with 21Vianet and Microsoft (China) on cloud computing in China | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Unisplendour signs MOU with 21Vianet and Microsoft (China) on cloud computing in China
text:
Sept 24 Unisplendour Corp Ltd
* Says signs strategic MOU with 21Vianet Group Inc and Microsoft (China) Co Ltd on cloud computing in China
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1jcPKCB
Further company coverage: (Reporting By Hong Kong newsroom)
